review.title: “Your satisfaction after internship will strongly depend on which deprtament you was assigned to”
review.pros: Pros – Good place to start your career if you are lucky enough to find a good supervisor / mentor120+ internships positionsAdditionals perks and networking / integration opportunities
review.cons: Cons – A lot of students were disappointed after the internship due to task and attitude of their supervisors, many menial task which didn't bring anything new to their experiencePretty low wage in comparison to other banking institutions in Poland
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
